nodes.id: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会民族和宗教委员会

zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会民族和宗教委员会
全国政协民族和宗教委员会
en: Committee for Ethnic and Religious Affairs of the National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference

description.zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会设立的专门委员会之一，由原民族委员会和宗教委员会于1995年合并而成。
description.en: One of the special committees of the CPPCC National Committee, formed in 1995 by the merger of the former Ethnic Affairs Committee and Religious Affairs Committee.

nodes.id: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会常务委员会

zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会常务委员会
en: Standing Committee of the National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference

description.zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会的常设机构，负责领导其专门委员会。
description.en: The standing body of the CPPCC National Committee, responsible for leading its special committees.

nodes.id: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会主席会议

zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会主席会议
en: Chairperson's Council of the National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference

description.zh-cn: 处理中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会常务委员会的重要日常工作，并领导其专门委员会。
description.en: Handles the important daily work of the Standing Committee of the CPPCC National Committee and leads its special committees.

nodes.id: 中国共产党中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会党组

zh-cn: 中国共产党中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会党组

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会中设立的领导机构。
description.en: The leadership body established by the Communist Party of China within the National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference.

nodes.id: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会专门委员会

zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会专门委员会
en: Special Committees of the National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference

description.zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会下设的负责各项专门领域的工作机构。
description.en: Working bodies under the CPPCC National Committee responsible for various specialized fields.

nodes.id: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会民族和宗教委员会办公室

zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会民族和宗教委员会办公室
en: Office of the Committee for Ethnic and Religious Affairs of the National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference

location.zh-cn: 北京市西城区太平桥大街23号

description.zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会民族和宗教委员会的办事机构。
description.en: The administrative office for the Committee for Ethnic and Religious Affairs of the CPPCC National Committee.

nodes.id: 中国人民政治协商会议第七届全国委员会民族委员会

zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议第七届全国委员会民族委员会

description.zh-cn: 1988年至1995年间存在的全国政协专门委员会，后与宗教委员会合并。
description.en: A special committee of the CPPCC National Committee that existed from 1988 to 1995, later merged with the Religious Affairs Committee.

nodes.id: 中国人民政治协商会议第七届全国委员会宗教委员会

zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议第七届全国委员会宗教委员会

description.zh-cn: 1988年至1995年间存在的全国政协专门委员会，后与民族委员会合并。
description.en: A special committee of the CPPCC National Committee that existed from 1988 to 1995, later merged with the Ethnic Affairs Committee.

nodes.id: 中国人民政治协商会议第八届全国委员会民族委员会

zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议第八届全国委员会民族委员会

description.zh-cn: 1993年至1995年间存在的全国政协专门委员会，后与宗教委员会合并。
description.en: A special committee of the CPPCC National Committee that existed from 1993 to 1995, later merged with the Religious Affairs Committee.

nodes.id: 中国人民政治协商会议第八届全国委员会宗教委员会

zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议第八届全国委员会宗教委员会

description.zh-cn: 1993年至1995年间存在的全国政协专门委员会，后与民族委员会合并。
description.en: A special committee of the CPPCC National Committee that existed from 1993 to 1995, later merged with the Ethnic Affairs Committee.

nodes.id: 中国人民政治协商会议章程

zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议章程
en: Charter of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference

description.zh-cn: 规定中国人民政治协商会议的性质、地位、组织和职权的根本法规。
description.en: The fundamental regulations that stipulate the nature, status, organization, and functions of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，现任第十四届全国政协民族和宗教委员会主任。
description.en: Politician of the People's Republic of China, current Chairman of the Committee for Ethnic and Religious Affairs of the 14th National Committee of the CPPCC.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，现任第十四届全国政协民族和宗教委员会副主任。
description.en: Politician of the People's Republic of China, current Vice Chairman of the Committee for Ethnic and Religious Affairs of the 14th National Committee of the CPPCC.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，现任第十四届全国政协民族和宗教委员会副主任。
description.en: Politician of the People's Republic of China, current Vice Chairman of the Committee for Ethnic and Religious Affairs of the 14th National Committee of the CPPCC.

description.zh-cn: 天主教北京总教区总主教，现任第十四届全国政协民族和宗教委员会副主任。
description.en: Archbishop of the Roman Catholic Archdiocese of Beijing, current Vice Chairman of the Committee for Ethnic and Religious Affairs of the 14th National Committee of the CPPCC.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，现任第十四届全国政协民族和宗教委员会副主任。
description.en: Politician of the People's Republic of China, current Vice Chairman of the Committee for Ethnic and Religious Affairs of the 14th National Committee of the CPPCC.

description.zh-cn: 中国道教协会会长，现任第十四届全国政协民族和宗教委员会副主任。
description.en: President of the Taoist Association of China, current Vice Chairman of the Committee for Ethnic and Religious Affairs of the 14th National Committee of the CPPCC.

description.zh-cn: 中国伊斯兰教协会会长，现任第十四届全国政协民族和宗教委员会副主任。
description.en: President of the Islamic Association of China, current Vice Chairman of the Committee for Ethnic and Religious Affairs of the 14th National Committee of the CPPCC.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，现任第十四届全国政协民族和宗教委员会副主任。
description.en: Politician of the People's Republic of China, current Vice Chairman of the Committee for Ethnic and Religious Affairs of the 14th National Committee of the CPPCC.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军上将，现任第十四届全国政协民族和宗教委员会副主任。
description.en: General of the People's Liberation Army, current Vice Chairman of the Committee for Ethnic and Religious Affairs of the 14th National Committee of the CPPCC.

description.zh-cn: 中国基督教三自爱国运动委员会主席，现任第十四届全国政协民族和宗教委员会副主任。
description.en: Chairman of the Three-Self Patriotic Movement of the Protestant Churches in China, current Vice Chairman of the Committee for Ethnic and Religious Affairs of the 14th National Committee of the CPPCC.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，现任第十四届全国政协民族和宗教委员会副主任。
description.en: Politician of the People's Republic of China, current Vice Chairman of the Committee for Ethnic and Religious Affairs of the 14th National Committee of the CPPCC.

description.zh-cn: 中国佛教协会会长，现任第十四届全国政协民族和宗教委员会副主任。
description.en: President of the Buddhist Association of China, current Vice Chairman of the Committee for Ethnic and Religious Affairs of the 14th National Committee of the CPPCC.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，现任第十四届全国政协民族和宗教委员会副主任。
description.en: Politician of the People's Republic of China, current Vice Chairman of the Committee for Ethnic and Religious Affairs of the 14th National Committee of the CPPCC.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，现任第十四届全国政协民族和宗教委员会副主任。
description.en: Politician of the People's Republic of China, current Vice Chairman of the Committee for Ethnic and Religious Affairs of the 14th National Committee of the CPPCC.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，曾任第七届全国政协民族委员会主任。
description.en: Politician of the People's Republic of China, former Chairman of the Ethnic Affairs Committee of the 7th National Committee of the CPPCC.

description.zh-cn: 中国社会活动家、宗教领袖，曾任第七、八届全国政协宗教委员会主任及第八届全国政协民族和宗教委员会主任。
description.en: Chinese social activist and religious leader, former Chairman of the Religious Affairs Committee of the 7th and 8th National Committees of the CPPCC, and Chairman of the Committee for Ethnic and Religious Affairs of the 8th National Committee of the CPPCC.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，曾任第八届全国政协民族委员会主任。
description.en: Politician of the People's Republic of China, former Chairman of the Ethnic Affairs Committee of the 8th National Committee of the CPPCC.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，曾任第九届全国政协民族和宗教委员会主任。
description.en: Politician of the People's Republic of China, former Chairman of the Committee for Ethnic and Religious Affairs of the 9th National Committee of the CPPCC.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，曾任第十届全国政协民族和宗教委员会主任。
description.en: Politician of the People's Republic of China, former Chairman of the Committee for Ethnic and Religious Affairs of the 10th National Committee of the CPPCC.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，曾任第十一届全国政协民族和宗教委员会主任。
description.en: Politician of the People's Republic of China, former Chairman of the Committee for Ethnic and Religious Affairs of the 11th National Committee of the CPPCC.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，曾任第十二届全国政协民族和宗教委员会主任。
description.en: Politician of the People's Republic of China, former Chairman of the Committee for Ethnic and Religious Affairs of the 12th National Committee of the CPPCC.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，曾任第十三届全国政协民族和宗教委员会主任。
description.en: Politician of the People's Republic of China, former Chairman of the Committee for Ethnic and Religious Affairs of the 13th National Committee of the CPPCC.

relationships.source: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会民族和宗教委员会
relationships.target: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会常务委员会

description.zh-cn: 民族和宗教委员会是在常务委员会和主席会议领导下的工作机构。
description.en: The Committee for Ethnic and Religious Affairs is a working body under the leadership of the Standing Committee and the Chairperson's Council.

relationships.source: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会民族和宗教委员会
relationships.target: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会主席会议

description.zh-cn: 民族和宗教委员会是在常务委员会和主席会议领导下的工作机构。
description.en: The Committee for Ethnic and Religious Affairs is a working body under the leadership of the Standing Committee and the Chairperson's Council.

relationships.source: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会民族和宗教委员会
relationships.target: 中国共产党中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会党组

description.zh-cn: 作为全国政协的下属机构，民族和宗教委员会接受全国政协党组的领导。
description.en: As a subordinate body of the CPPCC National Committee, the Committee for Ethnic and Religious Affairs accepts the leadership of the CPPCC National Committee's Party Group.

relationships.source: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会民族和宗教委员会
relationships.target: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会专门委员会

description.zh-cn: 民族和宗教委员会是全国政协设立的专门委员会之一。
description.en: The Committee for Ethnic and Religious Affairs is one of the special committees established by the CPPCC National Committee.

relationships.source: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会民族和宗教委员会办公室
relationships.target: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会民族和宗教委员会

description.zh-cn: 办公室是民族和宗教委员会的办事机构。
description.en: The Office is the administrative body of the Committee for Ethnic and Religious Affairs.

relationships.source: 中国人民政治协商会议第八届全国委员会民族委员会
relationships.target: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会民族和宗教委员会

description.zh-cn: 1995年3月15日，全国政协第八届全国委员会常务委员会决定将民族委员会与宗教委员会合并，成立民族和宗教委员会。
description.en: On March 15, 1995, the Standing Committee of the 8th National Committee of the CPPCC decided to merge the Ethnic Affairs Committee and the Religious Affairs Committee to form the Committee for Ethnic and Religious Affairs.

relationships.source: 中国人民政治协商会议第八届全国委员会宗教委员会
relationships.target: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会民族和宗教委员会

description.zh-cn: 1995年3月15日，全国政协第八届全国委员会常务委员会决定将宗教委员会与民族委员会合并，成立民族和宗教委员会。
description.en: On March 15, 1995, the Standing Committee of the 8th National Committee of the CPPCC decided to merge the Religious Affairs Committee and the Ethnic Affairs Committee to form the Committee for Ethnic and Religious Affairs.

relationships.target: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会民族和宗教委员会

description.zh-cn: 担任第十四届全国政协民族和宗教委员会主任。
description.en: Serves as the Chairman of the Committee for Ethnic and Religious Affairs of the 14th National Committee of the CPPCC.
